reviewText: At first I wasn't sure what I was going to get out of this book. I've spent time checking out other books that have tried to break down complicated matters into plain lingo. But when I checked out the first free pages. I was compelled to read the rest. I finally found a book to give me the information I needed to the point, with a creative view. (my favorite kind) I would recommend this book to anyone seeking an introduction into business intelligence. It helps break down complicated into less complicated.
title: Business Intelligence in Plain Language: A practical guide to Data Mining and Business Analytics
